Classification: Scripted
Genre: Family | Lifestyle | Military/War
Status: New Series
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Thursdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 27, 2012

Homefront is a drama series which follows the lives of some wives and one mother of soldiers who are serving in war torn Afghanistan.
